message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your position, the product's value is considerably higher than $10,000.  Could you consider $12,500?

Thank you for your follow-up offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer beyond $10,000. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
